62.ara-name: كتاب فضائل أصحاب النبى صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn Abi Mulaika:Somebody said to Ibn `Abbas, "Can you speak to the chief of the believers Mu`awiyah, as he does not pray except one rak`a as witr?" Ibn `Abbas replied, "He is a Faqih (i.e. a learned man who can give religious verdicts)

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرُ مُعَاوِيَةَ رضى الله عنه
chapter.eng-name: Narration about Mu'awiya رضي الله عنه
